content: Hello, how can I assist you with regards to Prakash Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd's HR policies today?

EL stands for Earned Leaves. Earned Leaves are generally taken for vacation, family outing, leisure, or to relax and have fun with family and friends. They can also be applied for own marriage, close members' death rituals, or any kind of long-term emergency, along with marriage or bereavement leave.

Key points to note about EL:

* EL can be applied for a minimum of 2 days.
* Medical certificates or doctor's reports may be required for EL, and HR may inquire with the respective doctors.
* EL encashment and carry forward will be done on a yearly basis based on the formula set by HR.
* EL will be carried forward to the next year if not availed in a particular year, and a few ELs can be encashed at the end of the year.
* Encashment of EL will be done on Basic Salary and not Gross Salary.
* In case of resignation, balanced EL is encashed in the Full & Final Settlement.
